languages.text: "Вот поэтому на Фенрисе жрецы следуют за воинами, а не воины за жрецами. Все их мысли — не о битве, а о богах и их зароках. Волку же надлежит думать об одном сражении и смерти врага, а не о целости чертогов и ждущих его трофеях".

"This is why on Fenris we have the priests follow the warriors, not the other way around. The priests never think about the battle ahead, only their tenets and taboos. But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."
languages.original_text: "Вот поэтому на Фенрисе жрецы следуют за воинами, а не воины за жрецами. Все их мысли — не о битве, а о богах и их зароках. Волку же надлежит думать об одном сражении и смерти врага, а не о целости чертогов и ждущих его трофеях".

traits.locale_text: "This is why on Fenris we have the priests follow the warriors, not the other way around. The priests never think about the battle ahead, only their tenets and taboos. But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."

But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."

But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “正因如此，我们在芬里斯都是祭司听战士的，而不是战士听祭司的。那群祭司从来都不会考虑什么战斗，只会考虑他们的信条与禁忌。可对我们太空野狼而言，我们只考虑如何战斗，如何杀死敌人，不会去想如何保护大教堂，也不会去想会得到什么样的战利品。”
languages.original_text: "This is why on Fenris we have the priests follow the warriors, not the other way around. The priests never think about the battle ahead, only their tenets and taboos. But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."

traits.locale_text: “正因如此，我们在芬里斯都是祭司听战士的，而不是战士听祭司的。那群祭司从来都不会考虑什么战斗，只会考虑他们的信条与禁忌。可对我们太空野狼而言，我们只考虑如何战斗，如何杀死敌人，不会去想如何保护大教堂，也不会去想会得到什么样的战利品。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « C'est pour ça que sur Fenris, les prêtres suivent les guerriers et pas l'inverse. Les prêtres ne pensent jamais à la bataille qui se profile à l'horizon, ils n'en ont que pour leurs doctrines et leurs tabous. Mais un Loup, lui, ne doit penser qu'au combat et à la mort de son ennemi, sans se soucier de sauver des cathédrales ou de compter les trophées qui l'attendent. »
languages.original_text: "This is why on Fenris we have the priests follow the warriors, not the other way around. The priests never think about the battle ahead, only their tenets and taboos. But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."

traits.locale_text: « C'est pour ça que sur Fenris, les prêtres suivent les guerriers et pas l'inverse. Les prêtres ne pensent jamais à la bataille qui se profile à l'horizon, ils n'en ont que pour leurs doctrines et leurs tabous. Mais un Loup, lui, ne doit penser qu'au combat et à la mort de son ennemi, sans se soucier de sauver des cathédrales ou de compter les trophées qui l'attendent. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「だからフェンリスでは逆に司祭が戦士に従うのだ。司祭どもは未来の戦いのことは考えず、自分たちの教義と禁忌だけを考える。だが狼は…狼は目の前の戦いと敵の死のことしか考えない。大聖堂を守ることでも、待ち受ける戦利品を数えることでもない」
languages.original_text: "This is why on Fenris we have the priests follow the warriors, not the other way around. The priests never think about the battle ahead, only their tenets and taboos. But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."

traits.locale_text: 「だからフェンリスでは逆に司祭が戦士に従うのだ。司祭どもは未来の戦いのことは考えず、自分たちの教義と禁忌だけを考える。だが狼は…狼は目の前の戦いと敵の死のことしか考えない。大聖堂を守ることでも、待ち受ける戦利品を数えることでもない」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Por eso en Fenris los sacerdotes acatan a los guerreros y no al revés. Los sacerdotes no se paran a pensar en lo que entraña la batalla, solo en sus dogmas y sus tabúes. Pero un Lobo... un Lobo solo piensa en la refriega y la muerte de su enemigo, no en proteger catedrales o contar los trofeos que le aguardan».
languages.original_text: "This is why on Fenris we have the priests follow the warriors, not the other way around. The priests never think about the battle ahead, only their tenets and taboos. But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."

traits.locale_text: «Por eso en Fenris los sacerdotes acatan a los guerreros y no al revés. Los sacerdotes no se paran a pensar en lo que entraña la batalla, solo en sus dogmas y sus tabúes. Pero un Lobo... un Lobo solo piensa en la refriega y la muerte de su enemigo, no en proteger catedrales o contar los trofeos que le aguardan».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Darum folgen auf Fenris die Priester den Kriegern, nicht umgekehrt. Die Priester denken nie an die kommende Schlacht, nur an ihre Lehren und ihre Tabus. Doch ein Wolf — ein Wolf darf nur an den Kampf und an den Tod seines Feindes denken, nicht daran, Kathedralen zu bewahren oder die Trophäen zu zählen, die ihn erwarten."
languages.original_text: "This is why on Fenris we have the priests follow the warriors, not the other way around. The priests never think about the battle ahead, only their tenets and taboos. But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."

traits.locale_text: "Darum folgen auf Fenris die Priester den Kriegern, nicht umgekehrt. Die Priester denken nie an die kommende Schlacht, nur an ihre Lehren und ihre Tabus. Doch ein Wolf — ein Wolf darf nur an den Kampf und an den Tod seines Feindes denken, nicht daran, Kathedralen zu bewahren oder die Trophäen zu zählen, die ihn erwarten."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Fenris'te rahiplerin savaşçıları takip etmesinin sebebi de bu, savaşçılar rahipleri takip etmez. Rahipler hiçbir zaman önlerinde yatan savaşı düşünmez, yalnızca kendi ilke ve dogmalarına bağlı kalırlar. Ancak bir Kurt... Bir Kurt; yalnızca savaşı ve düşmanının ölümünü düşünür, katedralleri korumayı veya kendini bekleyen ganimetleri değil."
languages.original_text: "This is why on Fenris we have the priests follow the warriors, not the other way around. The priests never think about the battle ahead, only their tenets and taboos. But a Wolf — a Wolf must think only of battle and his enemy's death, not about preserving cathedrals or counting the trophies that await him."
